content.content: 1. A summons issued under subsection 12 (1) of the Act shall be in the form entitled “Summons”, labelled as Form 1 and dated November 2014, that is available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository.  O. Reg. 116/95, s. 1; O. Reg. 271/15, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 1. A summons issued under subsection 12 (1) of the Act shall be in the form entitled “Summons”, labelled as Form 1 and dated November 2014, that is available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository.  O. Reg. 116/95, s. 1; O. Reg. 271/15, s. 2.

content.content: 2. A warrant issued under subsection 12 (4) of the Act shall be in the form entitled “Warrant for Arrest (Defaulting Witness)”, labelled as Form 2 and dated November 2014, that is available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository.  O. Reg. 116/95, s. 2; O. Reg. 271/15, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 2. A warrant issued under subsection 12 (4) of the Act shall be in the form entitled “Warrant for Arrest (Defaulting Witness)”, labelled as Form 2 and dated November 2014, that is available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository.  O. Reg. 116/95, s. 2; O. Reg. 271/15, s. 3.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 116/95, s. 3. Forms 1, 2 Revoked: O. Reg. 271/15, s. 4.  Français
content.raw_html:
3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 116/95, s. 3.

Forms 1, 2 Revoked: O. Reg. 271/15, s. 4.
